name: Shortcuts
description: Perform common tasks with your keyboard.

01.goBack.description: Navigation · Go back to the previous page in tab’s history

02.goForward.description: Navigation · Go forward to the next page in tab’s history

04.reloadTabWithoutCache.description: Navigation · Reload selected tabs, ignoring cached content

05.goToNextPage.description: Navigation · Go to the next page in the series

06.goToPreviousPage.description: Navigation · Go to the previous page in the series

08.goUp.description: Navigation · Go up in the URL hierarchy

09.goToRoot.description: Navigation · Go to the root URL

11.focusTextArea.description: Accessibility · Focus the first text area

14.copyURL.description: Clipboard · Copy URL of selected tabs

15.copyTitle.description: Clipboard · Copy title of selected tabs

16.copyTitleAndURL.description: Clipboard · Copy title and URL of selected tabs

17.openWebSearchForSelectedText.description: Web search · Perform a web search for selected text

26.scrollToTop.description: Scroll · Scroll to the top of the page

27.scrollToBottom.description: Scroll · Scroll to the bottom of the page

31.toggleFullScreen.description: Zoom · Turn full-screen mode on or off

32.openNewTab.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab

33.openNewTabRight.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab to the right

34.openNewWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window

35.openNewIncognitoWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window in Incognito mode

37.closeWindow.description: Close tabs · Close the window that contains the tab

38.restoreTab.description: Close tabs · Reopen previously closed tabs

40.togglePinTab.description: Tab state · Pin or unpin selected tabs

41.toggleGroupTab.description: Tab state · Group or ungroup selected tabs

42.toggleCollapseTabGroups.description: Tab state · Collapse or uncollapse tab groups

43.toggleMuteTab.description: Tab state · Mute or unmute selected tabs

45.sortTabsByURL.description: Organize tabs · Sort tabs by URL

46.groupTabsByDomain.description: Organize tabs · Group tabs by domain

47.focusAudibleTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the first audible tab

48.focusNextTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open tab

49.focusPreviousTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open tab

50.focusFirstTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the leftmost open tab

51.focusSecondTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second leftmost open tab

52.focusThirdTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third leftmost open tab

53.focusFourthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth leftmost open tab

54.focusFifthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fifth leftmost open tab

55.focusSixthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the sixth leftmost open tab

56.focusSeventhTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the seventh leftmost open tab

57.focusEighthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth leftmost open tab

58.focusLastTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the rightmost open tab

59.focusNextWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next window

60.focusPreviousWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous window

63.moveTabFirst.description: Move tabs · Move tab to the far left

64.moveTabLast.description: Move tabs · Move tab to the far right

65.moveTabNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to a new window

66.moveTabPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the previous window

67.moveTabGroupLeft.description: Move tabs · Move tab group left

68.moveTabGroupRight.description: Move tabs · Move tab group right

69.moveTabGroupFirst.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the far left

70.moveTabGroupLast.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the far right

71.moveTabGroupNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to a new window

72.moveTabGroupPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the previous window

73.selectTab.description: Select tabs · Deselect all other tabs

74.selectTabsInGroup.description: Select tabs · Select tabs in group

76.selectRightTabs.description: Select tabs · Select tabs to the right

78.openHistoryPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the History page

79.openDownloadsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Downloads page

80.openBookmarksPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Bookmarks page

81.openSettingsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Settings page

82.openPasswordsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Passwords page

83.openSearchEnginesPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Search engines page

84.openExtensionsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Extensions page

85.openShortcutsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Extensions > Keyboard shortcuts page

86.openExperimentsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Experiments page
